titles.title: Food Security Act Amendments of 1988
A bill entitled the "Food Security Act Amendments of 1988".

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Production.

committee.subcommittee: Agricultural Production and Stabilization of Prices
committee.name: Senate Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry

bill.summary: 6/15/1988--Introduced. Food Security Act Amendments of 1988 - Amends the Agricultural Act of 1949, effective for the 1988 wheat and feed grain crops, to exempt farmers in counties designated as disaster areas (due to drought or other natural disasters) from repayment of excess deficiency payments.
